data.title: IBM Certified Administrator for Rational UCM Fundamentals
data.meta_description: Know more about IBM Certified Administrator for Rational UCM Fundamentals.
data.text:
Vendor: IBM

Certification Overview

Using this certification, the professional will acquire the basic understanding of the necessary techniques and principles which are necessary to maintain the clear case in relation to the Rational unified UCM fundamentals. The individual will have to be experienced in some courses that have the basic essentials on Rational clear case UCM for windows as well as rational clear case UCM for UNIX. When it comes to the IT related courses, the level of experience is not necessarily the determining factor; the individual only needs to be ready to absorb the new skills because everything is done on a practical basis. The IBM certified Administrators in this course will acquire profound skills that will enable them to deal with many complex systems within the IT technology.

Who can do this certification?

Individuals who have acquired the basic skills in RS531 certification in Essentials of Rational clear case UCM for UNIX, Rs402 certification which deals with Configuration management with IBM Rational Clear case UCM, and RS612 certification which deals with Mastering Rational Clear case Administration for UNIX. The knowledge of working with operational systems and diversified database creation will also be an added advantage for all the potential students. Having the basic understanding of the unified change management model clear case v2003.This is an open course for all who need the UCM fundamentals, after all everything has been simplified through the internet.

Benefits

Through this certification, an individual will pave way into some of the most well paying occupations such as: A rational quality manager, rational software architect, rational developer, Rational Build forge among others. Such professionals are competent and will always have an attractive package of approximately 50000-80000 dollars in a year.

Associate Exam

An individual will have to pas the C2140-643-UCM Essentials test. This professional examination can be easily accessed and downloaded from the internet, once a potential candidate has met the needed requirements.

Examination Overview

The potential candidate will have to pass the C2140-643-UCM Essentials examination. This examination consists of topics which have been simplified into various sections to make it easier for the professional to evaluate on the strength and weaknesses. This is because the marks are put under every section and this will help an individual to know where to specialize most.

There are seven topics which are offered under this certification include:

Software configuration

Rational UCM fundamentals

Delivery considerations

Introduction to the Rational UCM fundamental

Configuration management

Process control

Basics for Rational UCM fundamentals

Through this certification, an individual will acquire knowledge on the commands and various operations that deal with Rational UCM fundamentals. Those professionals who have a good working experience with the windows fundamentals will find it easy to proceed along the course. The simplified training system through the online manuals is really helpful for all the level of learners. The potential candidate will be introduced to skills such as the UCM activities as well as version control systems that are commonly used in a number of platforms.

All the UCM users need to be skilled in the Clear Quest knowledge which will expose the student in working under various customer environments. This course is easy and the student will enjoy the goal targeted modules that should be done on a daily basis. The website also provides other courses related to this, when a student compares through the skills, he can easily integrate the skills and easily arrive at solutions depending on what is needed. It will be easy to navigate around through many simplified topics; some have sample tests and practicals which equip the learner with the latest skills.

The examination usually consists of 63 questions which should be done within a period of 90 minutes. For the award of this certificate, an individual should have at least a pass mark of 70 marks. The examination is composed of multiple choices which are usually done in English and Japanese language.

Validity of certificate

The C2140-643-UCM Essentials test will stop being valid once another examination has been issued, it is really necessary for the learner to be updated on the latest trends and skills.

Expert Review

This certification will enable the student to have the basic principles and techniques that revolve around the Rational UCM fundamentals. The diversified technology of the IBM solutions is always dynamic; it is really beneficial for the IT professional expert to be conversant with the essentials on the clear case management systems.

Marcus P, Rational Developer,

Canada
